text: The prostaglandins, especially prostaglandin E 2 (PGE 2 ) amplify the pain mechanism and enhance vascular permeability whereas the leukotrienes contract the smooth muscles of blood vessels, enhance vascular permeability and mediate proinflammatory and allergic responses [97] . Figure 1 represents the sites where essential oils or their main components have been detected as acting anti-inflammatory agents.
